Description: A vast, broken landscape dominated by tall, waving grasses that can swallow travelers whole, punctuated by rugged outcrops and dense thorny thickets.
Massive, high-altitude forests with trees large enough to support civilizations in their branches.
A fertile, vibrant valley located between the spurs of the mountain chain, protected from the harsher elements.
Once a living forest, now turned into stone and crystal by Chaos energy, located within the Crystal Basin.
A harsh, endless desert centered around volcanic activity. It features grit, intense heat, and "Ironwood Oases".
An ancient ocean bed turned into a shimmering salt desert after being heaved to the surface.
A desolate, scarred landscape filled with impact craters.
Volcanic plains located on the East Coast near the jungles.
Rocky, inaccessible islands and cliffs along the southern coast.
A massive, biologically hazardous river system filled with industrial runoff and natural toxins.
A dark, muddy swamp region similar to a "Bayou Noir" setting, featuring heavy fog and submerged dangers.
A maze of water channels along the East Coast jungles.
Geothermally heated springs in the southern mountains.
A massive range bisecting the continent, featuring snow-capped peaks and deep chasms.
A vertical biome of sheer cliffs, deep shadows, and constant fog/mist.
Active volcanic chains, particularly in the North.
Areas of unstable reality that separate the stable biomes. Physics do not function correctly here.
A massive crater roughly in the center of the continent where the "Engineer" god rests.
Stable, fertile plains used for massive-scale farming.
